channel.title: CVE Feed for Eskom -- Water Metering Software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eskom -- Water Metering Software

item.title: CVE-2023-1863|2024-08-02T06:05:26.730Z -- eskom -- water%20metering%20software
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Eskom Water Metering Software allows Command Line Execution through SQL Injection.This issue affects Water Metering Software: before 23.04.06.
